languages.text: За витражами мостика развернулась сцена преследования — несколько пиратских рейдеров пытаются настигнуть крейсер, безуспешно отправляя тому вслед заряды из макроорудий. Офицеры авгурной команды передают: перед вами "Неуловимое презрение" — легендарный пиратский флагман, что не одно столетие грабит грузовые суда по всему Простору и безнаказанно ускользает от патрулей с добычей.

traits.locale_text: За витражами мостика развернулась сцена преследования — несколько пиратских рейдеров пытаются настигнуть крейсер, безуспешно отправляя тому вслед заряды из макроорудий. Офицеры авгурной команды передают: перед вами "Неуловимое презрение" — легендарный пиратский флагман, что не одно столетие грабит грузовые суда по всему Простору и безнаказанно ускользает от патрулей с добычей.

languages.text: A chase is ensuing behind the stained-glass windows of the bridge — several pirate raiders are trying to catch up with the cruiser, fruitlessly firing salvos at it from their macro-cannons. The officers of the augur crew report: they're chasing the Elusive Contempt. It's a legendary pirate flagship that has been plundering cargo ships around the Expanse for several hundred years, masterfully evading patrols and escaping unpunished with the loot.
languages.original_text: За витражами мостика развернулась сцена преследования — несколько пиратских рейдеров пытаются настигнуть крейсер, безуспешно отправляя тому вслед заряды из макроорудий. Офицеры авгурной команды передают: перед вами "Неуловимое презрение" — легендарный пиратский флагман, что не одно столетие грабит грузовые суда по всему Простору и безнаказанно ускользает от патрулей с добычей.

traits.locale_text: A chase is ensuing behind the stained-glass windows of the bridge — several pirate raiders are trying to catch up with a cruiser, fruitlessly firing salvos from their macro-cannons at it. The officers of the augur crew report: they're chasing the Elusive Contempt. It's a legendary pirate flagship that has been robbing cargo ships around the Expanse for several hundred years, masterfully evading patrols and escaping unpunished with the loot.

A chase is ensuing behind the stained-glass windows of the bridge — several pirate raiders are trying to catch up with the cruiser, fruitlessly firing salvos at it from their macro-cannons. The officers of the augur crew report: they're chasing the Elusive Contempt. It's a legendary pirate flagship that has been plundering cargo ships around the Expanse for several hundred years, masterfully evading patrols and escaping unpunished with the loot.

The officers of the augur crew report: they're chasing the Elusive Contempt. It's a legendary pirate flagship that has been plundering cargo ships around the Expanse for several hundred years, masterfully evading patrols and escaping unpunished with the loot.

A chase is ensuing behind the stained-glass windows of the bridge — several pirate raiders are trying to catch up with the cruiser, fruitlessly firing salvos at it from their macro-cannons. The officers of the augur crew report: they're chasing the Elusive Contempt. It's a legendary pirate flagship that has been plundering cargo ships around the Expanse for several hundred years, masterfully evading patrols and escaping unpunished with the loot.

languages.text: 透过舰桥的彩色玻璃窗，可以看到太空中正在进行一场追逐战。几艘海盗突袭舰试图追击一艘巡洋舰，打算用宏炮对巡洋舰发动齐射，但没有成功。俄歇矩阵班组的军官报告说，这些海盗船是在追捕诡秘蔑视号，那是一艘传说中的海盗旗舰。几百年来，它一直在科罗努斯扩区掠夺货船，巧妙地躲避巡逻队，带着战利品一次又一次地逃脱了惩罚。
languages.original_text: A chase is ensuing behind the stained-glass windows of the bridge — several pirate raiders are trying to catch up with the cruiser, fruitlessly firing salvos at it from their macro-cannons. The officers of the augur crew report: they're chasing the Elusive Contempt. It's a legendary pirate flagship that has been plundering cargo ships around the Expanse for several hundred years, masterfully evading patrols and escaping unpunished with the loot.

traits.locale_text: 透过舰桥的彩色玻璃窗，可以看到太空中正在进行一场追逐战。几艘海盗突袭舰试图追击一艘巡洋舰，打算用宏炮对巡洋舰发动齐射，但没有成功。扫描甲板的军官报告说，这些海盗船是在追捕诡秘蔑视号，那是一艘传说中的海盗旗舰。几百年来，它一直在科罗努斯扩区掠夺货船，巧妙地躲避巡逻队，带着战利品一次又一次地逃脱了惩罚。

languages.text: ブリッジのステンドグラスの向こうで追跡劇が繰り広げられる。海賊の襲撃船数隻が巡洋艦に追いつこうと、マクロキャノンから無意味な砲撃を浴びせている。占術クルーの士官からの報告によると、彼らはエルーシブ・コントンプト号を追っている。数百年もの間、エクスパンス周辺の貨物船から略奪を繰り返し、パトロールから巧みに逃れ、戦利品を手にしながらもうまく罰を逃れ続けている伝説の海賊旗艦だ。
languages.original_text: A chase is ensuing behind the stained-glass windows of the bridge — several pirate raiders are trying to catch up with the cruiser, fruitlessly firing salvos at it from their macro-cannons. The officers of the augur crew report: they're chasing the Elusive Contempt. It's a legendary pirate flagship that has been plundering cargo ships around the Expanse for several hundred years, masterfully evading patrols and escaping unpunished with the loot.

traits.locale_text: ブリッジのステンドグラスの向こうで追跡劇が繰り広げられる。海賊の襲撃船数隻が巡洋艦に追いつこうと、マクロキャノンから無意味な砲撃を浴びせている。占術クルーの士官からの報告によると、彼らはエルーシブ・コントンプト号を追っている。数百年もの間、エクスパンス周辺の貨物船から略奪を繰り返し、パトロールから巧みに逃れ、戦利品を手にしながらもうまく罰を逃れ続けている伝説の海賊旗艦だ。

languages.text: Tras las vidrieras del puente se produce una persecución: varios atacantes piratas intentan alcanzar al crucero, disparándole infructuosamente salvas con sus macrocañones. Los oficiales del equipo de augures nos informan de que están persiguiendo al Odio Escurridizo. Se trata de una nave insignia pirata legendaria que lleva varios cientos de años saqueando cargueros por la Extensión, burlando con maestría a las patrullas y escapando impune con el botín.
languages.original_text: A chase is ensuing behind the stained-glass windows of the bridge — several pirate raiders are trying to catch up with the cruiser, fruitlessly firing salvos at it from their macro-cannons. The officers of the augur crew report: they're chasing the Elusive Contempt. It's a legendary pirate flagship that has been plundering cargo ships around the Expanse for several hundred years, masterfully evading patrols and escaping unpunished with the loot.

traits.locale_text: Tras las vidrieras del puente se produce una persecución: varios atacantes piratas intentan alcanzar al crucero, disparándole infructuosamente salvas con sus {g|Encyclopedia:MacroCannonsSpace}macrocañones{/g}. Los oficiales del equipo de augures nos informan de que están persiguiendo al Odio Escurridizo. Se trata de una {g|Encyclopedia:FlagshipSpace}nave insignia{/g} pirata legendaria que lleva varios cientos de años saqueando cargueros por la Extensión, burlando con maestría a las patrullas y escapando impune con el botín.{g|Encyclopedia:Catch}{/g}

languages.text: Vor den Buntglasfenstern der Brücke entwickelt sich eine Verfolgungsjagd. Mehrere Piratenschiffe versuchen, den Kreuzer einzuholen, und feuern vergeblich mit ihren Makrokanonen auf ihn. Die Offiziere der Augurencrew berichten, dass sie Jagd auf die Flüchtige Verachtung machen. Das legendäre Piratenflaggschiff plündert seit mehreren hundert Jahren Transporter in der gesamten Ausdehnung, entgeht meisterhaft sämtlichen Patrouillen und entkommt ungestraft mit der Beute.
languages.original_text: A chase is ensuing behind the stained-glass windows of the bridge — several pirate raiders are trying to catch up with the cruiser, fruitlessly firing salvos at it from their macro-cannons. The officers of the augur crew report: they're chasing the Elusive Contempt. It's a legendary pirate flagship that has been plundering cargo ships around the Expanse for several hundred years, masterfully evading patrols and escaping unpunished with the loot.

traits.locale_text: Vor den Buntglasfenstern der Brücke entwickelt sich eine Verfolgungsjagd. Mehrere Piratenschiffe versuchen, den Kreuzer einzuholen, und feuern vergeblich mit ihren Makrokanonen auf ihn. Die Offiziere der Augurencrew berichten, dass sie Jagd auf die Flüchtige Verachtung machen. Das legendäre Piratenflaggschiff plündert seit mehreren hundert Jahren Transporter in der gesamten Ausdehnung, entgeht meisterhaft sämtlichen Patrouillen und entkommt ungestraft mit der Beute.

languages.text: À travers les baies vitrées de la passerelle, vous êtes le témoin d'une course-poursuite acharnée : plusieurs chasseurs pirates tentent de rattraper le croiseur, enchaînant les salves d'artillerie sans parvenir à faire mouche. Les officiers des augures vous informent qu'ils pourchassent l'Insaisissable Avanie, un vaisseau amiral pirate légendaire qui pille depuis plusieurs siècles les transports de marchandises croisant dans les Étendues tout en échappant avec maestria aux patrouilles et en accumulant du butin en toute impunité.
languages.original_text: A chase is ensuing behind the stained-glass windows of the bridge — several pirate raiders are trying to catch up with the cruiser, fruitlessly firing salvos at it from their macro-cannons. The officers of the augur crew report: they're chasing the Elusive Contempt. It's a legendary pirate flagship that has been plundering cargo ships around the Expanse for several hundred years, masterfully evading patrols and escaping unpunished with the loot.

traits.locale_text: À travers les baies vitrées de la passerelle, vous êtes le témoin d'une course-poursuite acharnée : plusieurs chasseurs pirates tentent de rattraper le croiseur, enchaînant les salves d'artillerie sans parvenir à faire mouche. Les officiers des augures vous informent qu'ils pourchassent l'Insaisissable Avanie, un vaisseau amiral pirate légendaire qui pille depuis plusieurs siècles les transports de marchandises croisant dans les Étendues tout en échappant avec maestria aux patrouilles et en accumulant du butin en toute impunité.

languages.text: Köprünün vitraylarının ötesinde bir kovalamaca yaşanıyor. Birkaç korsan akıncısı, makro-toplarından boşuna salvolar ateşleyerek kruvazöre yetişmeye çalışıyor. Alamet mürettebatı subayları, Kaçkın Kibir'i kovaladıklarını rapor ediyor. Bu, Enginlik'in dört bir yanında yüzlerce yıldır kargo gemilerini yağmalayan, devriyelerden ustaca kaçınan ve ganimetle kaçmayı başaran, efsanevi bir korsan sancak gemisi.
languages.original_text: A chase is ensuing behind the stained-glass windows of the bridge — several pirate raiders are trying to catch up with the cruiser, fruitlessly firing salvos at it from their macro-cannons. The officers of the augur crew report: they're chasing the Elusive Contempt. It's a legendary pirate flagship that has been plundering cargo ships around the Expanse for several hundred years, masterfully evading patrols and escaping unpunished with the loot.
